ZXC-BLOG API (1.0.0)

Download OpenAPI specification:

API documentation for ZXC-BLOG

Auth

Authentication and authorization

Register a new user

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
email
required
string <email>
password
required
string <password>
username
required
string

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/auth/register

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "password": "pa$$word",
  • "username": "string"
}

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
email
required
string <email>
password
required
string <password>

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "email": "user@example.com",
  • "password": "pa$$word"
}

Authenticate with Google

Authorizations:
bearerAuth

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/auth/google

Google authentication callback

Authorizations:
bearerAuth

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/auth/google/callback

Refresh the access token

Authorizations:
bearerAuth

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/auth/refresh

Logout a user

Authorizations:
bearerAuth

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/auth/logout

Comments

Comment management

Retrieve a list of comments for a post

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
postId
required
integer

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/posts/{postId}/comments

Create a new comment

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
path Parameters
postId
required
integer
Request Body schema: application/json
required
content
required
string
authorId
required
integer
postId
required
integer
parentId
integer

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/posts/{postId}/comments

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "content": "string",
  • "authorId": 0,
  • "postId": 0,
  • "parentId": 0
}

Posts

Post management

Retrieve a list of posts

Authorizations:
bearerAuth

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/posts

Create a new post

Authorizations:
bearerAuth
Request Body schema: application/json
required
required
object (I18nString)
required
object (I18nString)
object (I18nString)
authorId
required
integer
published
boolean

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/posts

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/json
{
  • "title": {
    • "ko": "string",
    • "en": "string"
    },
  • "content": {
    • "ko": "string",
    • "en": "string"
    },
  • "summary": {
    • "ko": "string",
    • "en": "string"
    },
  • "authorId": 0,
  • "published": true
}

Retrieve a single post

bearerAuth
path Parameters
id
required
integer

Responses

Admin - Stats

Get a summary of site statistics

Authorizations:
bearerAuth

Responses

http://localhost:3001/api/admin/stats/summary

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/json
{
  • "totalPosts": 0,
  • "totalComments": 0,
  • "totalUsers": 0,
  • "totalLikes": 0
}

bearerAuth

Responses

Content type
application/json

  • {
    • "id": 0,
    • "title": { },
    • "viewCount": 0
    }
]

Admin - Users

bearerAuth

Content type
application/json
[
  • {
    • "id": 0,
    • "email": "string",
    • "name": "string",
    • "role": "USER",
    • "createdAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
    • "updatedAt": "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z"
    }
]
